FeatureGrid.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
FeatureGrid.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed to guide you from confusion to clarity.

roadmap.title: AI Career Roadmap
roadmap.desc: Stop guessing. Get a personalized, step-by-step career path generated by AI based on your unique strengths and interests.

alignment.title: Parent-Student Alignment
alignment.desc: Bridge the communication gap. Our dual-quiz system identifies where parents and students differ and helps find common ground.

colleges.title: Govt. College Discovery
colleges.desc: Quality education shouldn't be expensive. Discover top-rated government colleges nearby with low fees and high placement records.

solution.title: The Ultimate Career Solution
solution.desc: We solve the 'What Next?' crisis. From psychometric assessments to scholarship tracking, EduPath Navigator is the only tool you need to secure your future.

assessment.title: Psychometric Assessment
assessment.desc: Go beyond grades. Our scientific assessment evaluates your aptitude, personality, and emotional intelligence to find your perfect fit.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.desc: Language is no barrier to success. Access guidance, quizzes, and resources in your preferred regional language.
